product.description:
**Product Description**

The Royal Amethyst Saree is a stunning piece of Indian clothing that is perfect for any special occasion. The deep amethyst color is rich and luxurious, and the intricate bronze zari embroidery adds a touch of elegance. The saree is made from high-quality chiffon, which is soft and flowing. It comes with a matching blouse piece, which is also embellished with zari embroidery.

The Royal Amethyst Saree is perfect for weddings, parties, and other special events. It is sure to make you stand out from the crowd and feel like a million bucks.

**Product Details**

* Saree fabric: Chiffon
* Blouse fabric: Silk
* Saree length: 5.5 meters
* Blouse length: 0.8 meters
* Embroidery: Zari
* Color: Amethyst
* Occasion: Wedding, party, special event, Hindu

**Styling Tips**

The Royal Amethyst Saree can be styled in many different ways. Here are a few tips:

* For a classic look, pair the saree with a simple blouse and heels.
* For a more glamorous look, add a statement necklace and earrings.
* For a modern twist, wear the saree with a crop top and jeans.

No matter how you style it, the Royal Amethyst Saree is sure to make you look and feel your best.

**Care Instructions**

The Royal Amethyst Saree is a delicate garment, so it is important to care for it properly. Hand wash the saree in cold water with a mild detergent. Do not bleach. Dry the saree in the shade. Iron the saree on low heat.

items.desc: the Flat n Heels Women Heels fit real well at first, I suppose. However after a few hours into the night               I started to wish I had gone up a size or two. Every couple minutes I had to               re-adjust. It wasn't a cute look on the dance floor haha. Wish I had               size up, otherwise I've no other regrets.
items.title: Flat n Heels Women Heels

items.desc: As a first-time buyer, I must say, I am head over heels in love with my               purchase! The moment I delicately wear the Flat n Heels Women Heels, I felt an instant               connection, as if it was meant to be.               What impressed me the most was the comfort it provded throughout the day.
items.title: Flat n Heels Women Heels

items.desc: I recently had the pleasure of wearing the most enchanting Glitzy Galz Women Heels               for a special occasion, and let me tell you, heads turned and compliments poured               in all night long!               The fit was mostly great.
items.title: Glitzy Galz Women Heels

items.desc: I recently purchased the Glitzy Galz Women Heels from this store, and I must say, it's               absolutely stunning! The quality is premium, and the work is a testament to the remarkable craftsmanship.               The product is beautiful, and the rich color hasn't faded a bit even after a few wears.
